hero.badge: #1 AI Photo Editor for Real Estate
hero.title: Create Stunning
hero.subtitle: Transform photos 10x faster. No design skills needed.

features.title: Everything you need to create stunning listings
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed specifically for real estate professionals who want to save time and impress clients.

aiEnhancement.title: AI-Powered Enhancement
aiEnhancement.description: Our advanced AI transforms ordinary photos into stunning, professional-quality images automatically.

templates.title: Multiple Style Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of professionally designed styles to match your brand and property type.

fast.title: Results in Seconds
fast.description: No waiting around. Get your enhanced photos back in seconds, not hours or days.

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.description: Upload multiple photos at once and process entire property shoots in one go.

noSoftware.title: No Software Required
noSoftware.description: Everything runs in your browser. No downloads, no installations, no technical skills needed.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your photos are encrypted and automatically deleted after processing. Your data stays yours.

upload.title: Upload Your Photos
upload.description: Drag and drop your property photos or select them from your device. We support all common image formats.

enhance.title: AI Enhancement
enhance.description: Our AI analyzes each photo and automatically applies professional enhancements - lighting, color correction, and more.

download.title: Download & Share
download.description: Preview your enhanced photos and download them in high resolution. Ready to impress your clients immediately.

cta.title: Ready to transform your property photos?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of real estate professionals using Proppi

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay per project. No subscriptions, no surprises.

q1.question: How does the pricing work?
q1.answer: We charge per project, not per month. For photo enhancement, you pay €99 per property (up to 20 images). For video creation, you pay €99 per video. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.

q2.question: What image formats do you support?
q2.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. Maximum file size is 10MB per image. Enhanced images are delivered in high-resolution JPG format.

q3.question: How long does processing take?
q3.answer: Photo enhancement typically takes under 30 seconds per image. Video creation usually takes 5-10 minutes depending on the number of images and selected options.

q4.question: Can I try before I buy?
q4.answer: Yes! New users get free credits to try out the platform. You can enhance a few images to see the quality before committing to a full property project.

q5.question: What if I have more than 20 images?
q5.answer: If your property has more than 20 images, you can create multiple projects or contact us for custom pricing on larger shoots.

q6.question: Do you offer refunds?
q6.answer: If you're not satisfied with the results, contact us within 24 hours of processing and we'll work with you to make it right or provide a refund.
